alert.note: Alert for Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam; Richmond (Staten Is.); Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 10 at 1:53AM EST until December 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut, including the following areas, Northern Fairfield, Northern Middlesex, Northern New Haven, Northern New London, Southern Fairfield, Southern Middlesex, Southern New Haven and Southern New London, northeast New Jersey, including the following areas, Eastern Bergen, Eastern Essex, Eastern Passaic, Eastern Union, Hudson, Western Bergen, Western Essex, Western Passaic and Western Union, and southeast New York, including the following areas, Bronx, Kings (Brooklyn), New York (Manhattan), Northeast Suffolk, Northern Nassau, Northern Queens, Northern Westchester, Northwest Suffolk, Orange, Putnam, Richmond (Staten Island), Rockland, Southeast Suffolk, Southern Nassau, Southern Queens, Southern Westchester and Southwest Suffolk. * WHEN...From this afternoon through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Across much of the area, widespread minor urban and riverine flooding is expected, with a localized flash flood threat. Across Southern Connecticut, scattered instances of urban and riverine flash flooding are likely. Large stem rivers in southern Connecticut are also forecast to go into minor flood on Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Across portions of Long Island and Southern Connecticut, 3 to 5 inches of rainfall is likely, with locally 6+ amounts possible. Elsewhere, 2-4 inches is likely. Most of this rain will fall in a 12 hour period. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam; Richmond (Staten Is.); Rockland; Southern Westchester
